mapper.select: SELECT pd.*, p.*, teacher_img_real, DATE_FORMAT(pay_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS pay_date2, ad_name, ad_account FROM pay p JOIN pay_detail pd ON p.order_no=pd.order_no JOIN course c ON pd.course_no=c.course_no JOIN admin a ON c.education=a.ad_type WHERE detail_no = #{detail_no}

SELECT pd.*, p.*, teacher_img_real, DATE_FORMAT(pay_refund_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS pay_refund_date2, name FROM member m JOIN pay p ON m.member_no=p.member_no JOIN pay_detail pd ON p.order_no=pd.order_no JOIN course c ON pd.course_no=c.course_no WHERE detail_no = #{detail_no}
